cast.overview: Bond has left active service and is enjoying a tranquil life in Jamaica. His peace is short-lived when his old friend Felix Leiter from the CIA turns up asking for help. The mission to rescue a kidnapped scientist turns out to be far more treacherous than expected, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.
cast.title: No Time to Die

details.biography: Raymond Waring was born on July 21, 1977 in Bootle, Liverpool, England, UK. He is an actor and producer, known for 28 Weeks Later (2007), No Time to Die (2021) and 24 Hour Party People (2002).
details.name: Raymond Waring
